group_1.textLeft: What...? A being that ended up here from@the real world?
Oh - how do you do?@[chara:402150:cheek_0][chara:402150:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:402150:motion_201]Welcome to the Holy Maiden Academy!
...You mean that mysterious creature@that suddenly appeared at the school?

group_1.textRight: It seems to be an entity that doesn't follow@the laws of this world,
and yet doesn't have the characteristics@of an If Factor, either.
I've never seen anything like it.

group_1.textLeft: Do you have any proof that's the case?

group_1.textRight: No, but I'm almost certain it hails from@the real world.
More importantly...
[chara:402900:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]...my darling Nico is of the same mind!

group_1.textLeft: You've stopped covering up how mushy@your brain's become, I see...

group_1.textRight: The creature is wandering the school freely,@though. Is that alright?

group_1.textLeft: There's a good chance they've come@to the student council's attention by now.

group_1.textRight: I believe they're already under@the council's scrutiny,
but have remained untouched.@The council has yet to find a way...
...to use them to interfere with reality.

group_1.textLeft: The council doesn't have all@the components they need...?

group_1.textRight: That's what I think.

group_1.textLeft: We have to get them back to the real@world while we still can.
Otherwise, the real world will be in danger!

group_1.textRight: Yes. If a Witch as big as Crépuscule de@la Reine is resurrected and grows,
the worst case scenario could be@the end of humanity.
If that happens,
the basis for the existence of all the@imaginary worlds we live in will disappear.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean by that?

group_1.textRight: This "what if" world will also disappear,@never to be restored again.

group_1.textLeft: So, unlike before,
we wouldn't be able to continue?!
Then this is a grave crisis for both worlds.

group_1.textRight: What an obnoxious little vagrant!
I think it's best we return them...
...to their world quietly,
before the student council uses them@for evil...
...Looks like they're on the move.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, they left the club room?

group_1.textRight: Seems like they're taking their sweet time in@the library, poring over ancient documents...

group_1.textCenter: They haven't become aware of the phone yet.
They have no idea we're already undergoing@preparations for the ritual of the second coming.
Let's make our move and maintain our advantage.

group_1.textRight: I need to inform Minou...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, it's from you, Corbeau!

group_1.textRight: Right, you exchanged your phone@with Minou's...

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, and I only transferred the game,@not anything else!
I can't think of any way to send someone@back to their home world...
Would the library really have that@sort of knowledge?

group_1.textRight: There's a secret archive in the back.@I'm sure we'll find what we need there.
Nico and I have been collecting ancient@and modern grimoires and alchemy books.
We've been using it as our private@storage room.

group_1.textLeft: Which means we're dealing with@private property, aren't we?

group_1.textRight: And we're trespassing...
...Frankly, I don't see why we should@bother going through these pains.
Why don't we just shoot that creature dead?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:402150:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]We can't do that!@That's how a villain would resolve this!

group_1.textRight: ...When I look at that thing's face,@it infuriates me so much.

group_1.textLeft: But why?! It's adorable!

group_1.textRight: It's likely something Elisa has@carried over from her previous life...

group_1.textLeft: Are you alright, Melissa?

group_1.textRight: Oh - well...there's something that's been@bothering me.

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: Shouldn't there be two Philosopher's Stones@in this world?
Yes, Nico has the other.

group_1.textLeft: Is that safe?

group_1.textRight: It's true that it could be misused@as a source of magic,
but it's not something we need to worry@about since it's carefully stored in my home.

group_1.textLeft: Still, we don't want the student council@to come after him, too.
After all, if disaster strikes there, there'd@be nothing we could do to stop it, could there?

group_1.textRight: ...You're right.
I'll send a message to Nico to warn him.
